listCriteria.rule: Works more like a individual contributor, providing occasional coaching to the team memberson demand. Unqualified as a Lead Technical Consultant

Able to lead a small team but frequently requires PMOsupport and intervention. Issues are sometimes not escalated in a timely manner resulting in projectchallenges. Communicates independently with the US team, but sometimes communications issues arise.Unqualified as a Lead Technical Consultant.

Able to lead a small  team with limited PMO support. Pro-activelyraises issues before they require formal escalation . Communicates independently and effectively withthe US team. Marginally qualified as a Lead Technical Consultant.

Leads a medium sized team with limitedhelp from the PMO. Consistently leads teams to deliver successfully. Demonstrates China GDC level expertisein one or more technologies or business domains. Helps develop advanced capabilities in others throughtraining or coaching. Communicates with the US team effectively and pro-actively. Frequently receivespositive feedback from the US team and clients regarding their contributions.

Leads one or more medium sizedprojects simultaneously. Primary focus is developing other team members technical and business skillsthrough active coaching. Consistently delivers successful projects with very limited or no need forPMO support and intervention. Considered expert in multiple technical/business domains. Consistentlycommunicates pro-actively with the US team and receives positive feedback from the US team and clientsregarding the contributions they and their team are making to project(s).
Only contributes to the project he/she is working on. Refusesto take more organizational responsibilities even when requested.
Participating the organization of the company level activity. (Coe, Interview, Training, Knowledge Sharing) when requested.
Actively participates in  organization level activities (CoE, Interview, Training, KnowledgeSharing). Recognized expertise within the China GDC.
Organizes organizational level activities, leads a CoE, develops/delivers training thata large number of people participate in. Demonstrates expertise that is recognized beyond the ChinaGDC.
Involved in numerous organizationallevel activities, works among different departments, proactively works to gain/extend business opportunitiesfor the China GDC.
Fails todemonstrate the ability to learn and employ new concepts and technologies.
Demonstrates ability to learn and employ new concepts and technologies, but more slowly than expected
Learns new concepts and technologies quickly and is able to demonstrate competence in project deliveryafter short ramp-up (2 - 3 weeks of exposure).
Learns new concepts and technologies proactively and is able to apply them effectivelyin projects. Openly shares knowledge with others through knowledge sharing, training, and coaching.

Demonstrates thought leadershipby learning new concepts and technologies in advance of their immediate need and shares this knowledgewith others. Recognized expertise through certification or similar validation.
Only able to apply skills in a single technology or businessdomain; not flexible to work with various technologies or across business domains.
Only able to apply skills towards a single technology orbusiness domain, but demonstrates willingness to learn new things on a business-demand basis.
Applies skills to two or more technical orbusiness domains, but has difficulty or expresses disinterest in doing so.
Effectively applies skills to multiple technical or business domains asbusiness needs indicate
Demonstratescross-functional leadership by being a recognized leader across multiple technical or business domains. Proactively develops skills expanding in both core and non-core areas.
Works more like a individual contributor, providing occasional coaching to the team memberson demand. Unqualified as a Lead Technical Consultant
